Ru_trainchinese:
lún: (графема) шелковая нить; полиэфирное волокно
guān: (графема) голубая тесьма (используемая чиновниками для запечатывания в древнем Китае)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the thread (糸) you think about (侖) is green
humanum_short_description_en: Lun is "ethical". "Zhou Yi•Tun": "Gentlemen use economics" to sparse: "Luns are the key points, and weave comprehensive economics." See " lun ".
humanum_short_description: 綸是「作之有倫理也」。《周易•屯》：「君子以經綸」疏：「綸謂綱也，以織綜經綸」。參見「侖」。

綸字的基本解释

綸
lún

綸
guān
均见“纶”。

綸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lún］
［《廣韻》力迍切，平諄，來。］
“纶1”的繁体字。
(1)整理丝线。
(2)引申为经纶牵引。
(3)青丝绞合而成的带。古代低级官吏用以系印。
(4)粗丝线。多指钓丝。
(5)丝棉。
(6)指帝王的诏书旨意。
(7)通“倫”。伦理。
(8)地名。春秋虞邑。在今河南省虞城县东南三十里。
(9)姓。魏时有纶直、纶鱼。见《通志·氏族四》。
[②]［guān］
［《廣韻》古頑切，平山，見。］
“纶2”的繁体字。
(1)见“綸2巾”。
(2)即昆布。

綸字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　綸； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页928第07
【廣韻】力迍切【集韻】【韻會】龍春切，?音倫。【說文】靑絲綬也。【後漢·輿服志】百石靑紺綸，一采宛轉繆織，長丈二尺。　又【廣韻】絲綸。【釋名】綸，倫也，作之有倫理也。【易·屯卦】君子以經綸。【疏】綸謂綱也，以織綜經緯。【禮·緇衣】王言如絲，其出如綸。【疏】綸麤於絲。【後漢·章帝紀】吹綸絮。【註】綸似絮而細。　又【易·繫辭】故能彌綸天地之道。【釋文】京房云：綸，知也。王肅云：綸，纏裹也。荀云：綸，迹也。　又【詩·小雅】之子于釣，言綸之繩。【傳】綸，釣繳也。　又【莊子·齊物篇】而其子又以文之綸終。【音義】綸，琴瑟絃也。　又草名。【爾雅·釋草】綸似綸，組似組。東海有之。【博物志】綸似宛轉繩。　又姓。【魏志】孫文懿臣綸直。　又地名。【左傳·哀元年】虞思於是妻之以二姚，而邑諸綸。【註】綸，虞邑。　又【集韻】盧昆切，音論。義同。　又【廣韻】古頑切【集韻】姑頑切，?音鰥。靑絲綬。【北堂書鈔】晉紀云：王敦欲伐甘卓，遣使送白綸巾與卓，卓不取。又謝萬著白綸巾。【正字

Basic explanation of words
Lun
lún
Lun
guān

Lun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lún］
["Guangyun" forcefully cut, smooth, come. ]
Traditional characters for "lun1".
(1) Finish the silk thread.
(2) The extension is Jinglun traction.
(3) A belt made of twisted blue silk. Ancient low-level officials used to attach seals.
(4) Thick silk thread. Multi-finger fishing line.
(5) Silk cotton.
(6) Refers to the edict of the emperor.
(7) Through "lun". ethics.
(8) Place name. Spring and Autumn Yuyi. Thirty miles southeast of Yucheng County, Henan Province.
(9) Last name. Wei Shi had Lunzhi and Lunyu. See "Tongzhi·Clan IV".
[②]［guān］
["Guangyun" ancient stubbornness, Hirayama, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "lun 2".
(1) See "Lun 2 towel".
(2) That is kelp.
Lun
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　lun; Kangxi strokes: 14; page number: page 928 to 07
[Guangyun] Li Yiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Long Chunqie,? Yinlun. 【Said the text】Tiansi Sou also. [Later Han·Yufu Zhi] Baishi Qianlong Lun, one picking Wan turns Miuzhi, two feet long.　[Guangyun] Silken. [Release name] Lun, morality, and ethics. [Yi·Tun Gua] A gentleman uses economics. [Sparse] Lun is the main line, weaving warp and weft of heddle. 【Rite·Chen Yi】Wang Yan is like silk, and its output is like Lun. 【Sparse】Lun is thicker than silk. [Later Han·Zhang Diji] Blowing Lunxu. [Note] Lun is like flocculent but thin.　[Yi·Xi Ci] So it can be the way of heaven and earth. [Explanation] Jing Fangyun: Lun, Zhi Ye. Wang Suyun: Lun, wrap around. Xun Yun: Lun, trace also.　[Poetry·Xiaoya] The son of fishing, the rope of speech. [Biography] Lun, Diaojiao also.　[Zhuangzi·Qiwu Chapter] and his son ended up with the power of literature. [Sound meaning] Lun, Qin Se Xian also.　Also cursive name. 【Erya·Shicao】Lun is like Lun, group is like group. There is it in the East China Sea. 【Natural History】Lun like Wan turns the rope.　Another last name. [Wei Zhi] Sun Wenyi Chen Lunzhi.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·The First Year of Amour] Yu Si therefore took his wife to Er Yao, and Yi Zhu Lun. [Note] Lun, Yu Yi.　[Jiyun] Lu Kunqie, On Sound. The same meaning.　[Guangyun] Gu stubbornly [Jiyun] Aunt stubbornly,? Sound widow. Silk cogwheel. [Beitang Book Banknotes] Jin Jiyun: Wang Dun wanted to cut Ganzhuo, and sent an envoy to Bailun towel and Zhuo, but Zhuo didn't take it. Xie Wan wears a white towel. 【Orthographic
